main.description:
Go on an epicurean journey to Italy while basking in the sun-kissed glow of Boracay. Whet your appetite with hand-crafted pastas and brick-oven pizzas lovingly made from scratch. The chef's prized Josper Oven gives a distinctive smokey flavor to fork-tender steaks and fresh seafood, best paired with the Italian restaurant\`s exquisite wine selection and eclectic cocktail menu that are rare to find in the island.


The homemade goodness of Forno Osteria's culinary creations is as delicious as it is evocative â€” not to be missed when in Boracay.

We’ll let you in on a secret: all the best deals come when you book directly on our website. 

My Discovery Elite members get an additional 6% discount when they book this offer. Not yet a member? Sign up now!

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
Book this exclusive offer and enjoy these special perks on your stay.  

 

Inclusions:

  • Gourmet breakfast at Restaurant Tapenade for 2 persons for bookings for the Business Flat, Business Suite, Executive Suite and Executive Loft; and for 4 persons for bookings for the Primea Loft and Primea Suite.
  • High-speed Wi-Fi access for unlimited devices.
  • Access to the gym facilities and infinity pool.
  • Restaurant dining credits worth PHP 1,000 nett per stay that can be redeemed at Tapenade, Flame, and more.
  • Complimentary single-car parking.

 

Terms & Conditions:

  • A minimum stay of consecutive of two (2) nights is required.
  • Black-out dates apply.
  • This offer is subject to availability.

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
Enjoy up to 20% off on Best Available Rates, with freebies and exclusive perks. 

 

Inclusions:

Breakfast for two in a Junior and One Bedroom Suite, four in a Two Bedroom Suite, and six in a Three Bedroom Suite. 

High-speed internet access for multiple devices 

Access to Swimming Pool, Fitness Center, and Kiddie Romp Room 

Complimentary Snacks and Drinks 

Choice of Discovery Pizza or Penne Chicken Pasta with Tomato Cream Sauce 

One round of Signature Flavored Iced Tea 

20% Discount on Room Service 

Complimentary late check-out at 4:00pm (For Junior and One Bedroom Suites only. Subject to availability.) 

Free cancellation up to 24 hours before arrival 

In the purchase of goods or services that are on promotional discount, the senior citizen can avail of the promotional discount provided under the Expended Senior Citizen Act of 2010, whichever is higher of the two

 

Booking Period:

January 2020 – March 2021

 

Terms & Conditions:

Rooms are subject to availability. Black-out dates apply. 

Discounts for Two and Three-Bedroom Suites are not valid on Fridays and Saturdays, and will be subject to additional black-out dates. 

Offer may not be used in conjunction with other promos and discounts. 

Non-commissionable.

venues.title: Discovery Shores Boracay
venues.description:
Get up to 20% off on room rates and special perks when you book a minimum of 2 nights.

 

 

Inclusions:

Happy Mornings (daily breakfast) at Sands Restaurant 

Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Caticlan Airport 

Complimentary 1 pizza at Forno Osteria per stay 

Complimentary WiFi access 

20% discount in Indigo Restaurant and Forno Osteria 

15% discount on Terra Spa services 

10% discount on Room Service 

Welcome drink upon arrival

 

Terms & Conditions:

Full payment is required as guarantee. 

Offer is applicable to new bookings only 

Subject to availability at the time of reservation 

Rate for extra person charge applies 

Cancellations made 3 days prior to arrival will be subject to full cancellation charges

venues.title: Club Paradise Palawan
venues.description:
Stay for a minimum of 2 nights and enjoy up to 20% off on room rates plus special perks.  

 

Inclusions:

 Daily breakfast at Firefish Restaurant 

Roundtrip land and boat transfers from and to Busuanga airport for two persons 

Complimentary 1 pizza at Firefish Restaurant per stay 

15% discount on drinks at Dugong Bar 

15% discount on Glow Spa services 

10% discount on moon light dinner setup 

Welcome drink upon arrival

 

Terms & Conditions:

Offer is valid for new bookings only 

Extra person charge applies 

Cancellations made 3 days prior to arrival will be subject to full cancellation charges 

Subject to availability at the time of reservation

main.description: Located on the 16th floor, FLAME is Discovery Primeaâ€™s Modern European restaurant. The menu combines modern European cuisine with Asian flavors and contemporary culinary techniques, creating dishes that tantalize every taste and texture. Enjoy an exciting new repertoire of exquisite dishes created by Executive Chef Luis Chikiamco.

main.subtitle: The art of dining
main.description:
Perfectly cooked, the best steaks in Manila take center stage at 22 Prime amid a stunning view of the skyline of the Ortigas Business District. Located on the 22nd floor, the award-winning restaurant is Discovery Suitesâ€™ flagship dining restaurant and is widely recognized as the countryâ€™s foremost name in US Prime Angus steaksâ€”named one of the Best Restaurants by Tatler Philippines for years and counting.

Indulge in refined dining options with Executive Chef Gerwin Bailonâ€™s culinary creations: a selection of premium cuts with impeccable wine pairings. In this meat loverâ€™s mecca, the dining experience receives a distinctive and unforgettable flair.

schedules.title: Monday to Sunday
schedules.time:
12NN to 2PM (by reservation)
 5PM to 10PM (available for reservation and walk-ins)

schedules.title: Advanced reservation at least one (1) day prior to arrival is encouraged.

main.description:
Showcasing the bold, light, and summery flavors of the Mediterranean is Restaurant Tapenadeâ€”a Discovery Primea signature dining destination. 

Apart from its well-known authentic paella flavors, another distinctive highlight of the restaurant is the Tapenade Salad Room, which offers one of the most luxurious salad experiences in the Philippines. 
Relish an abundant smorgasbord of newly-harvested greens, exquisite salad sauces, freshly-shucked oysters, and premium cold cuts and cheese stations. 

Indulge in Executive Chef Luis Chikiamcoâ€™s bestseller, the Porcini-Crusted US Angus Rib-Eye.
